machines.name: Electric Counterbalance Forklift Truck
machines.description: A battery-powered forklift with forks at the front and a heavy battery pack as a counterweight. Commonly used in warehouses for pallet handling, these forklifts typically lift 1–3 tons to heights around 3–6 meters, with zero emissions and low noise ideal for indoor use.

suppliers.availability_notes: Local distributor for electric forklifts (2.0–2.5 ton models, quote on request). Estimated price range based on market standards*
Local seller offering 1.5–2.0 ton HELI electric forklifts (price ~450,000 DZD). Local stock available
3.0 ton lithium-battery forklift (model EFX5-301) available for export (MOQ 1 unit)

suppliers.supplier_name: Jinan Shine International Trade Co., Ltd.
suppliers.availability_notes: Chinese trading company supplying 2–3 ton electric forklifts (fast delivery ~15-20 days)

machines.name: Reach Forklift Truck
machines.description: An electric narrow-aisle forklift designed with extendable forks to 'reach' into high racking. Reach trucks typically handle 1–2 ton pallet loads and can lift them to heights of 8–12 meters while operating in tight warehouse aisles.

suppliers.availability_notes: Authorized STILL dealer offering FM-X series reach trucks (lift height up to 13 m, available on order). Estimated price for premium European brand*
Local supplier of Jungheinrich reach trucks (ETV series and others). Contact for exact pricing. Estimated range for premium brand*
Manufacturer of 1.5–3.0 ton reach trucks (various mast heights up to ~10 m, 4-wheel or scissor reach designs)
Offers specialized 4-directional reach forklifts (up to ~2 ton capacity) for export (made-to-order)

machines.name: Order Picker Forklift
machines.description: A specialized electric lift truck that elevates the operator on a platform to pick individual items from rack shelves. These machines allow an operator to be lifted up to around 9–10 meters high to retrieve products.

suppliers.availability_notes: Offers STILL low-level and high-level order pickers (OPX series, etc., available on request). Estimated price range*
Exclusive distributor of JLG mobile order pickers in Algeria (vertical man-up stock pickers, available by inquiry). Estimated price*

suppliers.supplier_name: New Newton (Taizhou) Forklift Truck Co., Ltd.
suppliers.availability_notes: Manufactures small electric order picker platforms (300 kg capacity, 2.7–4.5 m lift) with CE certification
Retailer offering reconditioned stand-up order picker forklifts (e.g. Crown SP series) ready for immediate shipment

machines.name: Rough Terrain Forklift
machines.description: A heavy-duty forklift built for outdoor use on uneven or unpaved surfaces. Rough terrain forklifts feature large knobby pneumatic tires and higher ground clearance for stability on mud, gravel, or rough ground.

suppliers.availability_notes: Official Manitou dealer in Algeria supplying 4x4 masted forklifts (e.g. Manitou M-X series) and telehandlers (available on order). Estimated price for premium brand*
Local manufacturer of diesel forklifts (up to 10-ton models); offers all-terrain forklift options under TIRSAM brand. Estimated price range*
Exports 2–5 ton off-road diesel forklifts (Goodsense or similar brand) with quick delivery (typically 1 unit minimum)
Chinese supplier offering 2WD/4WD rough terrain forklifts (2.5T–3T capacity) at competitive prices for export

machines.name: Pallet Jack
machines.description: A simple wheeled industrial truck used to lift and move pallets at ground level. Pallet jacks have fork tines that slide under a pallet and a hydraulic pump handle to raise the load a few inches off the floor.

suppliers.availability_notes: Multiple Algerian sellers offer 3-ton manual pallet jacks around 40,000 DZD (in stock for immediate pickup)
Imports and distributes HELI manual pallet trucks (3,000 kg capacity) and other handling equipment. Estimated price range*
Chinese OEM offering manual pallet trucks (e.g. 2T–3T with scale) in bulk (MOQ 10 units, CE certified)
Online industrial supplier with various 5500-lb (2.5 ton) pallet jacks in stock (ships within 1 business day in the U.S.)

machines.name: CNC Lathe
machines.description: A CNC lathe is a computer-controlled turning machine tool for producing precise cylindrical parts. It rotates the workpiece on a spindle while a cutting tool removes material.

suppliers.availability_notes: New (never used). Local distributor for CNC equipment. Estimated price range based on market standards*

machines.name: CNC Milling Machine
machines.description: A CNC milling machine is a computer-controlled cutting tool that removes material with rotary cutters, ideal for complex shapes.

machines.name: CNC Grinding Machine
machines.description: A CNC grinding machine uses a rotating abrasive wheel to remove material and achieve high-precision finishes. It can perform surface or cylindrical grinding for tight tolerances.

machines.name: Wire EDM Machine

machines.name: CNC Laser Cutting Machine
machines.description: A CNC laser cutting machine uses a high-energy laser beam to cut or engrave materials with exceptional precision. Commonly used for metal fabrication.

machines.name: Salt Bath Furnace
machines.description: Salt bath furnaces immerse workpieces in a molten salt solution to heat or cool them uniformly. The salt bath provides rapid heat transfer and a controlled atmosphere.

machines.name: Box Furnace
machines.description: Box furnaces (batch furnaces) are insulated chambers that heat multiple workpieces simultaneously under controlled conditions.

suppliers.availability_notes: Various capacities available. Estimated delivery*

machines.name: Continuous Furnace
machines.description: Continuous furnaces use a conveyor or roller system to process materials continuously, maintaining a steady flow of workpieces through the heated chamber.

machines.name: Vacuum Furnace
machines.description: Vacuum furnaces operate under vacuum or inert gas to prevent contamination during heat treatment. By removing air, they eliminate oxidation and decarburization.

machines.name: Induction Heating Furnace
machines.description: Induction furnaces use electromagnetic induction to heat metal inside a crucible. They heat the material from within and can operate under vacuum or inert atmospheres for clean, efficient melting and heat treatment.

machines.name: Injection Molding Machine
machines.description: Injection molding machines produce plastic parts by injecting molten plastic into a mold under high pressure. They are widely used in manufacturing plastic products ranging from small components to large containers.

machines.name: Extruder Machine
machines.description: Extrusion machines continuously shape molten plastic by forcing it through a die, producing items like pipes, sheets, and films.

machines.name: Blow Molding Machine
machines.description: Blow molding machines form hollow plastic parts (such as bottles or containers) by inflating heated plastic inside a mold cavity.

machines.name: Compression Molding Machine
machines.description: Compression molding machines shape materials by applying heat and pressure to a preform or resin in a closed mold. Used for thermosetting plastics, rubbers, and composites.

machines.name: Thermoforming Machine
machines.description: Thermoforming machines heat plastic sheets and then form them into shapes using molds and vacuum or pressure. Commonly used to make packaging trays and food containers.

suppliers.availability_notes: Specializes in vacuum forming equipment for food packaging industry. Estimated range*
Supplier of thermoforming and packaging machinery in Algeria. Estimated range*

machines.name: Vertical Form Fill Seal Machine
machines.description: A vertical form-fill-seal (VFFS) machine automatically forms pouches from flexible film, fills them with product, and seals them. Widely used in food, pharmaceutical, and chemical industries for packaging powders, grains, liquids, and snacks. For example, FusionTech Algeria offers a VFFS model that is listed as in stock for immediate supply.

suppliers.availability_notes: In stock
Contact supplier for pricing
Ready to ship

machines.name: Liquid Filling Machine
machines.description: Liquid filling machines automate the dispensing of liquid products (water, oils, sauces, etc.) into bottles or containers. They can be piston-driven or pump-based with high precision. Innovex Algeria lists piston and pump-driven fillers that can handle 20 to 17000 ml/min, suitable for food, cosmetic, and pharmaceutical industries.

suppliers.availability_notes: Contact supplier for pricing
Contact supplier for pricing

machines.name: Capping Machine
machines.description: Capping machines automate the application of caps onto bottles or containers (screw caps, push-on caps, etc.), ensuring fast and accurate closure. They are common in beverage, cosmetic, and pharmaceutical production. Innovex Algeria offers a lateral electric capper (model XLG-63) for 16–50 mm caps.

machines.name: Labeling Machine
machines.description: Labeling machines apply adhesive labels to products or packaging surfaces (bottles, boxes, etc.) quickly and precisely. They range from manual applicators to fully automatic systems. For example, Alibaba lists square-bottle automatic labelers around $3800, and local suppliers like SAM Machinery offer automatic labeling solutions.

machines.name: Sealing Machine
machines.description: Sealing machines close bags or films by applying heat and pressure. Continuous band sealers or impulse sealers are typical in packaging lines to hermetically seal bags of products. Innovex Algeria supplies continuous sealers (e.g. model FRBM-810I for horizontal bag sealing).

suppliers.availability_notes: Contact supplier for pricing

machines.description: Device that measures the geometry of physical objects by sensing discrete points on the object's surface.

machines.name: X-Ray Inspection Machine
machines.description: Uses X-rays to inspect the internal structure of objects for defects or quality control.

machines.name: Hardness Testing Machine
machines.description: Instrument to measure the hardness of materials, i.e. resistance to deformation or indentation.

machines.name: Spectrometer
machines.description: Instrument for measuring properties of light or atomic emissions to analyze material composition.

suppliers.availability_notes: Authorized distributor

machines.name: Digital Microscope
machines.description: Microscope with built-in digital imaging to magnify and capture images of samples.

machines.name: Automated Guided Vehicle (AGV)
machines.description: Battery-powered vehicle that follows fixed paths or tracks to move materials in a facility.

machines.name: Autonomous Mobile Robot (AMR)
machines.description: Mobile robot that navigates using built-in sensors and maps without fixed guides.

machines.name: Automated Storage and Retrieval System (AS/RS)
machines.description: Mechanized system of lifts or shuttles for storing and retrieving goods in warehouses.

machines.name: Robotic Arm
machines.description: Programmable manipulator arm used for handling, welding, painting, and other automated tasks.

machines.name: Collaborative Robot (Cobot)
machines.description: Robot designed to safely operate alongside human workers without extensive guarding.

machines.name: Air Compressor
machines.description: Machine that compresses and delivers pressurized air for industrial uses.

machines.name: Industrial Chiller
machines.description: Machine that cools fluids or air by removing heat via refrigeration processes.

machines.name: Industrial Boiler
machines.description: Boiler for producing steam or hot water for power and industrial processes.

machines.name: Industrial Pump
machines.description: Pump used to move fluids (liquids or gases) in industrial systems.

machines.name: Diesel Generator
machines.description: Engine-driven generator set that produces electrical power using diesel fuel.

machines.name: Welding Machine
machines.description: Equipment for fusing materials (typically metals) together, such as arc welders and TIG welders.

machines.name: Automatic Screwdriving Machine
machines.description: Machine that automatically feeds screws and fastens them, for high-speed assembly.

machines.name: Paint Spray Booth
machines.description: Enclosed booth for spray painting parts or vehicles, with ventilation and filtration.

machines.name: Vibratory Deburring Machine
machines.description: Equipment that uses high-frequency vibrations to remove burrs and polish small parts.

machines.name: Ultrasonic Cleaning Machine
machines.description: Cleaning device that uses ultrasound waves and a cleaning fluid to remove contamination from items.
